parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: If the order has been paid for

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of user that placed the order

requests.request_body:
{
  "order": {
    "name": "Order 1",
    "paid": true,
    "email": "email@example.com"
  }
}
requests.request_headers:
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:
requests.response_body:
{
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "name": "Order 1",
  "paid": true
}
requests.response_headers:
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Location: http://example.org/orders/1
X-Ua-Compatible: IE=Edge,chrome=1
E-Tag: "5fffd66f61cdd4ab8881584dbf5e72cf"
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate
X-Runtime: 0.037236
Content-Length: 58
requests.curl: curl http://localhost:3000/orders -d "{"order":{"name":"Order 1","paid":true,"email":"email@example.com"}}" -X POST -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Host: example.org" -H "Cookie: "

requests.request_headers:
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:

{
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "name": "Order 1",

}
